projects.title: Excavation Viewer
projects.description: An interactive 3D viewer of the excavation of prehistoric stilt houses at Attersee, Austria. The surrounding area, as well as high-resolution photogrammtery scans of the different excavation layers can be examined virtually.

projects.title: Virtual Gallery
projects.description: An interactive experience of the degree program Media Technology & Design at the University of Applied Austria Available in VR or as a desktop version. Numerous works created during the course are exhibited. Easily addable, modular displays (2D, 3D, audio, video & code/web/game) allow new projects to be added constantly.
projects.software: Blender3D, Unity, Adobe Photoshop, Ableton Live
